title: YOU GOT F D IN THE A
text: Butters' room. He's working on a little village, which might be a model of South Park. Stan enters and walks up to him. Butters glances back and then looks at his work again.

And if you can't face that, then you might as well sit here and play Leggos until you're an old man.
